channel.title: Dragon Prophet
channel.description: Anybody played this yet? Has a pretty cool story line and the graphics are pretty good. I am still pretty new at it but I am currently trying to get my own dragon to ride.

item.title: Dragon Prophet
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Oh man, I spent like an hour customizing my character lol

Read full topic

yeah I was never really into it sadly

I am more of a runescape fan

item.title: Dragon Prophet
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:534393”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=653188.msg4378650#msg4378650 date=1382828533]
It does look interesting, what are some of the features that you like the best about it?
[/quote]well …

-decently looking graphcs ( at max of course)
-very large map/you can freely access most of the world you just have to survive lol
-not too slow/not too fast for leveling
-some really cool swords ( personally before greatswords)
-I like how dragons can fight with you

what I dont like:
-a lot of the specials don’t look that great to be honest[/quote]

I need to play with you guys again, Dragons Nest was fun. Also i got a mic now but my gaming desktop broke…

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Prophet
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:7, topic:534393”]It does look interesting, what are some of the features that you like the best about it?[/quote]well …

-decently looking graphcs ( at max of course)
-very large map/you can freely access most of the world you just have to survive lol
-not too slow/not too fast for leveling
-some really cool swords ( personally before greatswords)
-I like how dragons can fight with you

what I dont like:
-a lot of the specials don’t look that great to be honest

item.title: Dragon Prophet
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:5, topic:534393”]so its a mmo version of http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drakan:_The_Ancients’_Gates[/quote]better than that

Now that Kieran and I are both starting to really get a hang of the game/battle configurations you can apparently have your dragons fight along side you which is awesome
